name: Army Shoot Bottle Training
description:
Army Shoot Bottle Training is an action packed, exciting game in which you have to shoot and break all bottles. Just aim your gun at the bottle and shoot to watch them explode on your screen!
Stunning 3D graphics and realistic glass shattering sounds will make you feel like a real bottle shooter!

FEATURES of Army Shoot Bottle Training:
- Many Different Guns
- Exciting gun skins
- Stunning 3D Graphics
- Smooth and Easy Controls
- Several challenging missions
- Many exciting levels of immersive bottle shooting
- Realistic bottle breaking sounds
